2059070.name: Isotopia
2059070.description:
Punch through a wall!

Experience a custom voxel engine where everything is destructible in real-time. The game's unique destruction algorithms allow for an unprecedented level of interaction with the environment. From shattering floating islands to tunneling through solid rock, the landscape reacts dynamically to your actions.

Procedural Animation and Unpredictable Enemies

Battle against procedurally animated creatures that move and react in lifelike ways, providing a fresh challenge each time. Enemies range from the absurdly comical to the deeply terrifying, each with unique behaviors and weaknesses to exploit.

Mysteries of a Forgotten Civilization

Embark on a narrative journey filled with surreal and unexpected twists. Unravel the enigmatic history of a universe where humanity has vanished. Encounter bizarre artifacts and remnants of ancient technology. Piece together the story from environmental cues and cryptic lore scattered throughout the worlds.

Voxel Art Style and Visual Effects

Dive into a visually stunning voxel world, combining retro charm with modern graphical effects. Enjoy detailed environments, from the smallest voxel to expansive landscapes, enhanced by atmospheric lighting and particle effects.

Work is in progress!

Experience a game that's constantly improved with new updates, adding new content and mechanics. Join a community passionate about shaping the game's future. Participate in discussions, provide feedback, and watch the game evolve with updates.

Features currently implemented


  • Voxel engine with full destructibility built on top of Unity 3D, enabling the destruction of every wall, object, and enemy.
  • A mix of predefined and procedurally generated levels, offering a unique combination of structured and random gameplay experiences.
  • Satisfying first-person combat system with physically moving enemies that react dynamically.
  • Dynamic player movement system inspired by the likes of Quake and Portal.
  • Diverse environmental themes, from surreal jungles and cosmic voids to post-apocalyptic deserts, each with their own unique aesthetics and challenges.
  • Advanced voxel destruction algorithms, including a custom-built hybrid of Octree and Virtual 3D array data structures, ensuring smooth and realistic destruction.
  • Procedural NPC animation, making each encounter unpredictable and entertaining.
  • Real-time 3D pathfinding that adapts to dynamically changing environments.
  • Diverse arsenal of weapons, both melee and ranged, each offering a unique way to shape the environment and/or obliterate your enemies.
  • Support for both keyboard-mouse and controller input, emphasizing intuitive and responsive controls.
  • Optimized for a wide range of hardware, ensuring smooth performance even on older systems.
  • Dynamic music and sound design that adapt to gameplay scenarios, enhancing immersion.

Planned features


  • A complete narrative set millions of years in the future, where humanity has long vanished, leaving behind a wealth of artifacts and mysterious locations to explore, each twisted in its own way.
  • Character progression system, allowing players to enhance abilities and unlock new talents.
  • Crafting and upgrading mechanisms for weapons and gear, using materials gathered from the environment.
  • Secret areas and hidden treasures scattered across levels, encouraging thorough exploration.
  • Multiple game modes including story-driven missions, free exploration, and specific challenges.
  • More items, weapons, upgrades, levels
  • Quest system and talking with npcs
  • Trade system
  • Planned updates and expansions post Early Access, with potential additions like base building, in-game voxel editing, and new dimensions to explore.
